burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa

Class WeightGradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa.WeightGradient

  • public class WeightGradient
extends java.lang.Object
    A data structure for defining the gradient of the weights for a vector. If the weight gradient is not stored for a given feature, then zero will be returned.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WeightGradient()
      Initializes with the gradient unspecified for any weights.
      WeightGradient(int capacity)
      Initializes with the gradient unspecified, but reserves space for the given capacity

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getPartialDerivative(int weightId)
      Returns the partial derivative for the given weight
      void put(int weightId, double partialDerivative)
      Adds the partial derivative for a given weight

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeightGradient

        public WeightGradient()
        Initializes with the gradient unspecified for any weights.

      • WeightGradient

        public WeightGradient(int capacity)
        Initializes with the gradient unspecified, but reserves space for the given capacity
        Parameters:
        capacity - how much space to reserve for storing the gradient; i.e., the number of weights over which the gradient will be defined

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put(int weightId,
                double partialDerivative)
        Adds the partial derivative for a given weight
        Parameters:
        weightId - the weight identifier for which the partial derivative is to be stored is to be stored
        partialDerivative - the partial derivative value for the weight

      • getPartialDerivative

        public double getPartialDerivative(int weightId)
        Returns the partial derivative for the given weight
        Parameters:
        weightId -
        Returns:
        the partial derivative for the given weight; 0 if it is not stored.
